THE
April 29, 1958
UNIVERSITY
OF
MICHIGAN
PRESS
ANN ARBOR
TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN
The University of Michigan Press has published the following
works of music:
Cuyler, Louise E., FIVE POLYPHONIC MASSES by Heinrich Isaac.
Cuyler, Louise E., Heinrich Isaacâ€™s CHORALIS CONSTANTINUS,
BOOK III, Transcribed from the Formschneider First
Edition, Preface by Howard Hanson.
In the summer of 1958, The University of Michigan Press will
publish:
Finney, Ross Lee, SIXTH STRING QUARTET IN E.
Finney, Ross Lee, QUINTET FOR PIANO AND STRINGS.
Very truly yours,
THE UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN PRESS
Edwin Watkins
Assistant Director
